channel.title: Erm can someone help?

item.title: Erm can someone help?
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

ok i want a npc to say if im online i did this

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("owner danny")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Danny Is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Danny is OFFLINE";

and it say this

ive tried to cap my name and still nothing works please help

Read full topic
